mapper.select: select r.no as no , r.userid as userId , m.username as userName , s.store_name as storeName , r.content , case to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') when to_char(r.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') then to_char(r.reg_date, 'hh:mm:ss') else to_char(r.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') end regDate , r.grade as grade from t_reply r inner join t_member m on m.userid = r.userid inner join t_store s on s.store_no = r.store_no where s.store_no = #{storeNo} order by r.no desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_reply(no, userid, store_no, content, grade) values(seq_t_reply_no.nextval, #{userId}, #{storeNo}, #{content}, #{grade})
